short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Download reddit images faster than ever

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
A small application I made to help me download images from Reddit. Mainly made to convert image galleries that have been changed into .webp back into their orignal format. 

The project is open source so you can make your own personal changes to it.
